name: Travel
Description: Travel blogs are becoming more popular each day. Due to cheap air travel, people are traveling more than ever

name: Music
Description: Music blogs has a wide audience who search for critiques on the best and trending music.

name: Food
Description: Food blogs are another popular blog type. It attracts a lot of readers who are interested in recipes, ingredients, healthy eating

name: Fitness
Description: Fitness blogs has been a hot trend since they cover important topics like health and general fitness.

name: Sports
Description: Sports blogs are another interesting type of blogs online. Every country in the world has different sports and every sport has its own stars.
